14. Unit Base Class¶

14.1. Unit Base Class – sinon.unit¶

class sinon.api.unit.Unit(uid)[source]¶

Bases: sinon.api.attributes.Attributes

Base class for DataUnit and ComputeUnit.

wait(state=['Done', 'Failed', 'Canceled'], timeout=None, ttype='Sync')[source]¶
Parameters:state (enum state (PENDING, ACTIVE, DONE, FAILED, CANCELED, UNKNOWN)) – the state to wait for
Returns:Nothing, or a Task on ASYNC calls
Return type:None or Task
Raises :BadParameter (on invalid initialization)

Block until the unit reaches the specified state, or timeout, whichever comes first. Negative timeout block forever, zero/None timeout never block.

cancel(ttype='Sync')[source]¶
Parameters:
  • state (enum state (PENDING, ACTIVE, DONE, FAILED, CANCELED, UNKNOWN)) – the state to wait for
  • ttype (enum ttype (SYNC, ASYNC)) – method type

:returns : Nothing, or a Task on ASYNC calls :rtype : None or Task :raises : BadParameter (on invalid initialization)

Move the unit into Canceled state – unless it it was in a final state, then state is not changed.
